subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tom Lehman shot a bogey-free five-under 67 at Shoal Creek to take a one-stroke lead after the first round of the Regions Tradition, the Champions Tour’s first major of the season.
snippet: Tom Lehman shot a bogey-free five-under 67 at Shoal Creek to take a one-stroke lead after the first round of the Regions Tradition, the Champions Tour’s first major of the season.
